title: At a Restaurant: Greeting & Seating (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Greeting & Seating subcategory within At a Restaurant. Includes 7 card(s).

cards.english: How many people in your party?
Which do you prefer, smoking or non-smoking?
cards.romaji: Kin'en, kitsuen, dochira ni shimasu ka?
cards.japanese: 禁煙、喫煙、どちらにしますか？
